content:
This file includes a uniqueId without a value. I assume this is invalid and either needs to be defined/required or the uniqueId shouldn't be generated.

{'type': 'uri', 'preferred': True}
I may not be using the latest; let me check.
OK looks like this one is fixed. Can I delete a topic entirely?
You can edit prior items to remove the text if you've made it recently enough - but generally it's enough to say it's closed. Admins have the power to delete posts if it's truly necessary
